_module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto 0;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

A qualified freight forwarder can ensure the shipment of your goods is completed quickly and successfully. Your forwarder is responsible for organizing and tracking the transportation of your goods and acts as a middleman between you and the transport companies. The right freight forwarding firm makes the shipping process more efficient and can help importers and exporters save time and money.

At A Customs Brokerage, we’re experts in freight forwarding. From the start of the shipping process to the end, we’ll work with you every step of the way to ensure your goods get where they need to be when they need to be there.

Get in touch today to learn more about how our professional freight forwarding services can help you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/cargo.jpg” title_text=”cargo” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”23bf9273-8d95-45be-925d-5e17cead9746″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”ColumnReverse” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|30px|60px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|20px|25px|false|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/New-Project-14.jpg” title_text=”New Project (14)” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”236fce37-e69a-4881-940d-c2feba202d54″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/cargo-ship.json” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”39fe25d2-5a3f-4b79-b7f3-605380ed8141″ locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″]

What is Freight Forwarding?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

A freight forwarder, forwarder, or forwarding agent, is a person or company that organizes shipments on behalf of individuals or corporations. They help to move goods from the manufacturer to a final point of distribution. A forwarder will contract with a carrier such as an airline or steamship line to move the goods from origin to destination. Freight forwarding can be a complex operation. Freight forwarders simplify this operation by utilizing their connections and expertise to arrange smooth transport for your goods. This includes all aspects of the shipping process, from when it leaves to when it is successfully delivered.

Forwarding operations include arranging and tracking transportation, filing all necessary documentation for imports and exports, obtaining insurance, negotiating and paying shipping fees, and more. Ultimately, freight forwarders are masters of logistics and ensure there are no hiccups while your goods are being shipped.

[/et_pb_text][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/package-delivery-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”23px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

Comprehensive Freight Forwarding Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ text_text_color=”#000000″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

A Customs Brokerage is an NVOCC-licensed company with the Federal Maritime Commission. As such, we have proven knowledge and expertise in the shipping and freight forwarding process. You can trust our experienced team to ensure your shipment complies with all applicable rules and regulations.

We offer weekly services from the Far East and Europe, including Full Container Loads (FCL) and Less than Container Loads (LCL) via our own direct consolidation services.

Our freight forwarding services include:

  • Air Consolidations
  • Ocean Consolidations
  • Direct Shipments
  • Charters

Our dedicated client support staff will handle the logistics of your shipment from end to end. We treat all of our clients like partners —we take special care to provide industry-leading services that aid in your company’s growth. From coordinating the shipment to export compliance to the assurance of arrival, we’ll be with you every step of the way.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|60px|60px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|40px|40px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|30px|25px|false|true” border_radii=”off|||25px|25px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/graph-line-growth-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Contact A Customs Brokerage: Your Cargo Concierge Today

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

A qualified and experienced freight forwarding firm can ensure the smooth delivery of your goods.

At A Customs Brokerage, our relationships with shipping companies, knowledge of international shipping laws, and dedication to top-tier customer service make us a great choice for importers and exporters searching for a premier freight forwarding firm.

Contact A Customs Brokerage today to learn more about our freight forwarding services.

and challenges, and being their top choice for all their cargo needs.

excerpt.rendered: A qualified freight forwarder can ensure the shipment of your goods is completed quickly and successfully. Your forwarder is responsible for organizing and tracking the transportation of your goods and acts as a middleman between you and the transport companies. The right freight forwarding […]
